We tell stories
through stone,
exploring themes on
heritage and community

A creative agency for artists, communities, and councils who care where stories are carved.
Stone age meets render age.

  • heritage [tap]
  • culture [tap]
  • architecture [tap]

Working in Heritage

We bring history to life through filmmaking, digital transformation, and placemaking. From archives to public artworks, we help heritage sites, museums, and councils tell their stories in ways that honor the past while shaping meaningful experiences in the present. Every stone has a story, and we make sure it’s seen, heard, and remembered.

Supporting Cultural Initiatives

Our lens captures the pulse of communities and creative expression. Through filmmaking and interactive workshops, we work with artists and cultural organisations to explore identity, tradition, and contemporary practice. We help stories resonate, fostering dialogue and connection across generations.

Partnering with Architecture Projects

We celebrate the artistry of built environments through filmmaking and sculptural interventions. From public spaces to private projects, we highlight the narratives embedded in materials, form, and design, creating works that reflect both vision and craftsmanship. Stone age meets render age.
